caption:
🌟 COMPETITION TIME! 🌟
WIN the ultimate trip to Lyon and the Beaujolais region in France with @valleedelagastronomie worth ~€3,000 🙏🏼🇫🇷❤️

Spend 4 days indulging your senses in the vineyards and incredible restaurants in the gastronomic capital of France.

Trains, hotel, visits, meals, cruises, museums, transport, plus a chauffeur driven car to visit Beaujolais... everything is planned and included for a magnificent stay in France!

Click on the link in @clerkenwellboyec1's bio to take part...
& TAG a friend who'd love to WIN! 

Free entry to the draw, from July the 4th through July the 28th 2024 at midnight. The winner of the prize draw will be notified by email from July the 31st 2024. Note: The winner is required to use the prize in one trip only, between August the 15th and December the 31st 2024.

Many thanks to... @pullmanlyon @restaurantrustique @restaurantlepoelondor @tasty_lyon @ninkasifr @biennaledelyon @hameau_duboeuf @les_maritonnes_rouge_et_blanc @chateaudecorcelles @huileriebeaujolaise @onlylyon @a.la.lyonnaise @destinationbeaujolais @auvergnerhonealpes.tourisme 

#OnlyLyon #PullmanLyon #rustique #biennaledelyon #tastylyon #lepoelondor #ninkasi #hameauduboeuf #lesmaritonnes #chateaudecorcelles #huileriebeaujolaise #beaujolais #destinationbeaujolais #myauvergnerhonealpes #explorefrance
